segments.text: My attention keeps drifting to the two children near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite industrious, I must say, trying to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed out, making it appear ready to tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already in the cookie jar, a true mission of stealth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand is holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, almost acting as a lookout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, an open palm, clearly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a tiny team of confectionary conspirators.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors just frame their little escapade perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how absorbed the woman is, missing all this fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such youthful exuberance and determination for a sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are truly dedicated to their cookie quest.
segments.speaker: PAR
